course_description: This interdisciplinary course examines birth in the context of global health. Themes of joy, fear, pain in childbirth, and meanings of pregnancy will be explored. Urgent issues in global reproductive health will be discussed, e.g., reproductive rights, equity, access, and quality of health care.
sections: Class Nbr: 3950, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 4-6:50p, Instructor: S. Spangler, Status: Open
